details:
Case 186 is a 64 year-old male Singapore citizen who has no recent travel history to affected countries and regions. He is currently warded in an isolation room at NCID. He is linked to Case 166.

He reported onset of symptoms on 5 March and had sought treatment at a GP clinic on the same day, and the emergency department at KTPH on 10 March. As he had been identified as a contact of Case 166, he was referred by MOH to National Centre for Infectious Diseases (NCID) on 11 March. Subsequent test results confirmed COVID-19 infection on 12 March morning.

Prior to hospital admission, he had gone to work at Samwoh Corporation Pte Ltd (25 E Sungei Kadut Street 1). He stays at Woodlands Street 13.
